1.quote: Wake the fuck up, Samurai! We have a city to burn.
1.author: Johnny Silverhand

2.quote: And you're a cunt. Maybe we'll fit together after all.
2.author: Johnny Silverhand

3.quote: Not even an itch on your daddy's ballsack.
3.author: Johnny Silverhand

4.quote: To Bring An End To The Madness You Wreak.
4.author: Johnny Silverhand

5.quote: Only Two Willing To Spread Their Legs For You? Sad.
5.author: Johnny Silverhand

6.quote: Fuck V. I’ve Been Dead The Last Half Century.
6.author: Johnny Silverhand

7.quote: Know What? You’re Starting To Remind Me Of Me.
7.author: Johnny Silverhand

8.quote: Doesn’t Matter How Good You Are In Night City. On Your Own, You’re F**ked.
8.author: Johnny Silverhand

9.quote: Of All The Heads I Could Have Popped Up In, Hella Glad It Was Yours.
9.author: Johnny Silverhand

10.quote: Goodbye, V, And Never Stop Fighting.
10.author: Johnny Silverhand

11.quote: I’ll take you to the moon, no matter what it takes.
11.author: David Martinez

12.quote: When you’re in Night City, the only way to go is forward.
12.author: David Martinez

13.quote: The city doesn’t decide who you are. You do.
13.author: David Martinez

14.quote: Dreams are for dreamers. In Night City, you make your reality.
14.author: David Martinez

15.quote: What’s the point of surviving if you can’t be who you are?
15.author: David Martinez

16.quote: Legends aren’t born. They’re made by fire.
16.author: David Martinez

17.quote: You don’t run from the edge. You conquer it.
17.author: David Martinez

18.quote: It’s not how you start, it’s how you finish.
18.author: David Martinez

19.quote: Here lies a man who died to prove he lived as he wanted.
19.author: David Martinez (Memorial)

20.quote: Everyone gets a chance to choose the road they walk.
20.author: David Martinez (Memorial)

21.quote: You didn't take me to the moon, but you were there with me.
21.author: David Martinez (Memorial)

22.quote: You never had to save me, all I wanted was for you to live!
22.author: Lucy

23.quote: The city’s just a cage. And I’m ready to fly away.
23.author: Lucy

24.quote: If you can’t trust yourself, who can you trust?
24.author: Lucy

25.quote: There’s no place for dreams in Night City.
25.author: Lucy

26.quote: The moon isn’t a dream. It’s a promise.
26.author: Lucy

27.quote: We all have demons, but they don’t define us.
27.author: Lucy

28.quote: When the city breaks you, the moon will set you free.
28.author: Lucy

30.quote: Every runner has their limit. Find yours before it finds you.
30.author: Lucy

31.quote: We all want freedom. But what’s the cost?
31.author: Lucy

32.quote: This city’s just a glorified cemetery.
32.author: Judy Alvarez

33.quote: Don’t ever let the city tell you who to be.
33.author: Judy Alvarez

34.quote: The only way to survive Night City is to stay human.
34.author: Judy Alvarez

35.quote: Sometimes, you gotta make your own family.
35.author: Judy Alvarez

36.quote: Not everything in life has a restart button.
36.author: Judy Alvarez

37.quote: We all have scars. It’s what we do with them that counts.
37.author: Judy Alvarez

38.quote: The city takes and takes until there’s nothing left.
38.author: Judy Alvarez

39.quote: Don’t let Night City take your heart.
39.author: Judy Alvarez

40.quote: We’re more than just our chrome.
40.author: Judy Alvarez

41.quote: Sometimes, you just have to burn it all down.
41.author: Judy Alvarez

42.quote: Family’s not who you’re born with. It’s who you’d die for.
42.author: Panam Palmer

43.quote: Out here, we fight for each other, not for ourselves.
43.author: Panam Palmer

44.quote: You’ve got the heart of a Nomad. Don’t let the city take it.
44.author: Panam Palmer

45.quote: Life’s a highway. Just make sure you’re driving.
45.author: Panam Palmer

46.quote: Sometimes, home is just a place where people care.
46.author: Panam Palmer

47.quote: You don’t run from your problems. You face them.
47.author: Panam Palmer

49.quote: Sometimes, you gotta leave to really find yourself.
49.author: Panam Palmer

50.quote: Nomads live by one rule: we survive together.
50.author: Panam Palmer

51.quote: The road always leads somewhere. Just don’t lose your way.
51.author: Panam Palmer

52.quote: You either lose yourself, or you lose it all.
52.author: V

53.quote: The city doesn’t forgive. It eats people alive.
53.author: V

54.quote: Someday, someone will turn the city into a desert. But not today.
54.author: V

55.quote: You can’t trust Night City, but you can trust yourself.
55.author: V

56.quote: This city’s never gonna stop chewing people up and spitting them out.
56.author: V

57.quote: Every street in this city tells a story. Most end in blood.
57.author: V

59.quote: We all start as dreamers in this city. It’s what happens after the dream dies that matters.
59.author: V

60.quote: I didn’t choose this life, but I’ll damn well live it on my own terms.
60.author: V

61.quote: Chrome don’t make you invincible. A bullet to the head’s still a bullet to the head.
61.author: V

62.quote: The edge isn’t just a place. It’s a state of mind.
62.author: V

63.quote: You either fight for a future or fade into the past.
63.author: V

64.quote: Some people call it greed. I call it survival.
64.author: V

65.quote: Night City’s not for the faint-hearted. Good thing I’m not.
65.author: V

66.quote: This Is It. It’s The End Of The Line For Me. But Not For You.
66.author: Maine

67.quote: I’m gonna keep going, no matter what happens.
67.author: Maine

68.quote: Let’s go, kid. You got a job to do.
68.author: Maine

69.quote: No one’s gonna stop me. Not now, not ever.
69.author: Maine

70.quote: You think I’m just some damn thug?
70.author: Maine

71.quote: I can still feel it. That rush. It’s like nothing else.
71.author: Maine

72.quote: If you want to survive, you’ve gotta adapt.
72.author: Maine

73.quote: We’re Edgerunners, David. That’s the only family you got.
73.author: Maine

74.quote: We’re not just surviving, we’re thriving.
74.author: Maine

75.quote: You can’t just give up. Not like that.
75.author: Maine

76.quote: This world, it’ll chew you up if you let it.
76.author: Maine

77.quote: I told you before, we’re family. And I take care of my family.
77.author: Maine

78.quote: We’ve all got our demons. The trick is, not letting them win.
78.author: Maine

79.quote: Keep your head up, David. Keep it together.
79.author: Maine

80.quote: Get in, get out, and keep your mouth shut.
80.author: Maine

81.quote: I don't need anyone to tell me who I am.
81.author: Maine
